00047 /* Annealing parameters */
00048 #define BETA 0.6 
00049 #define ALPHA 0.90
00050 #define EXC_PROB 0.4 
00051 #define JUMP_UP_PROB 0.36
00052 #define MAXGEN_RATIO 15.0
00053 #define STOP_TEMP 1.0
00054

00076 static  int     tosses;
00077 static  int     acceptances;

00091 static int stopping_criterion ARGS((int c1, int c2, int c3, int c4, double temp));
00092 static double random_generator ARGS(());
00093 static int ddExchange ARGS((DdManager *table, int x, int y, double temp));
00094 static int ddJumpingAux ARGS((DdManager *table, int x, int x_low, int x_high, double temp));
00095 static Move * ddJumpingUp ARGS((DdManager *table, int x, int x_low, int initial_size));
00096 static Move * ddJumpingDown ARGS((DdManager *table, int x, int x_high, int initial_size));

00128 int
00129 cuddAnnealing(
00130   DdManager * table,
00131   int  lower,
00132   int  upper)
00133 {
00134     int         nvars;
00135     int         size;
00136     int         x,y;
00137     int         result;
00138     int         c1, c2, c3, c4;
00139     int         BestCost;
00140     int         *BestOrder;
00141     double      NewTemp, temp;
00142     double      rand1;
00143     int         innerloop, maxGen;
00144     int         ecount, ucount, dcount;
00145    
00146     nvars = upper - lower + 1;
00147 
00148     result = cuddSifting(table,lower,upper);
00149 #ifdef DD_STATS
00150     (void) fprintf(stdout,"\n");
00151 #endif
00152     if (result == 0) return(0);
00153 
00154     size = table->keys - table->isolated;
00155 
00156     /* Keep track of the best order. */
00157     BestCost = size;
00158     BestOrder = ALLOC(int,nvars);
00159     if (BestOrder == NULL) {
00160         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00161         return(0);
00162     }
00163     copyOrder(table,BestOrder,lower,upper);
00164 
00165     temp = BETA * size;
00166     maxGen = (int) (MAXGEN_RATIO * nvars);
00167 
00168     c1 = size + 10;
00169     c2 = c1 + 10;
00170     c3 = size;
00171     c4 = c2 + 10;
00172     ecount = ucount = dcount = 0;
00173  
00174     while (!stopping_criterion(c1, c2, c3, c4, temp)) {
00175 #ifdef DD_STATS
00176         (void) fprintf(stdout,"temp=%f\tsize=%d\tgen=%d\t",temp,size,maxGen);
00177         tosses = acceptances = 0;
00178 #endif
00179         for (innerloop = 0; innerloop < maxGen; innerloop++) {
00180             /* Choose x, y  randomly. */
00181             x = (int) Cudd_Random() % nvars;
00182             do {
00183                 y = (int) Cudd_Random() % nvars;
00184             } while (x == y);
00185             x += lower;
00186             y += lower;
00187             if (x > y) {
00188                 int tmp = x;
00189                 x = y;
00190                 y = tmp;
00191             }
00192 
00193             /* Choose move with roulette wheel. */
00194             rand1 = random_generator();
00195             if (rand1 < EXC_PROB) {
00196                 result = ddExchange(table,x,y,temp);       /* exchange */
00197                 ecount++;
00198 #if 0
00199                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Exchange of %d and %d: size = %d\n",
00200                         x,y,table->keys - table->isolated);
00201 #endif
00202             } else if (rand1 < EXC_PROB + JUMP_UP_PROB) {
00203                 result = ddJumpingAux(table,y,x,y,temp); /* jumping_up */
00204                 ucount++;
00205 #if 0
00206                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Jump up of %d to %d: size = %d\n",
00207                         y,x,table->keys - table->isolated);
00208 #endif
00209             } else {
00210                 result = ddJumpingAux(table,x,x,y,temp); /* jumping_down */
00211                 dcount++;
00212 #if 0
00213                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Jump down of %d to %d: size = %d\n",
00214                         x,y,table->keys - table->isolated);
00215 #endif
00216             }
00217 
00218             if (!result) {
00219                 FREE(BestOrder);
00220                 return(0);
00221             }
00222 
00223             size = table->keys - table->isolated;       /* keep current size */
00224             if (size < BestCost) {                      /* update best order */
00225                 BestCost = size;
00226                 copyOrder(table,BestOrder,lower,upper);
00227             }
00228         }
00229         c1 = c2;
00230         c2 = c3;
00231         c3 = c4;
00232         c4 = size;
00233         NewTemp = ALPHA * temp;
00234         if (NewTemp >= 1.0) {
00235             maxGen = (int)(log(NewTemp) / log(temp) * maxGen);
00236         }
00237         temp = NewTemp;                 /* control variable */
00238 #ifdef DD_STATS
00239         (void) fprintf(stdout,"uphill = %d\taccepted = %d\n",
00240                        tosses,acceptances);
00241         fflush(stdout);
00242 #endif
00243     }
00244 
00245     result = restoreOrder(table,BestOrder,lower,upper);
00246     FREE(BestOrder);
00247     if (!result) return(0);
00248 #ifdef DD_STATS
00249     fprintf(stdout,"#:N_EXCHANGE %8d : total exchanges\n",ecount);
00250     fprintf(stdout,"#:N_JUMPUP   %8d : total jumps up\n",ucount);
00251     fprintf(stdout,"#:N_JUMPDOWN %8d : total jumps down",dcount);
00252 #endif
00253     return(1);
00254 
00255 } /* end of cuddAnnealing */

00275 static int
00276 stopping_criterion(
00277   int  c1,
00278   int  c2,
00279   int  c3,
00280   int  c4,
00281   double  temp)
00282 {
00283     if (STOP_TEMP < temp) {
00284         return(0);
00285     } else if ((c1 == c2) && (c1 == c3) && (c1 == c4)) {
00286         return(1);
00287     } else {
00288         return(0);
00289     }
00290 
00291 } /* end of stopping_criterion */

00305 static double
00306 random_generator(
00307    )
00308 {
00309     return((double)(Cudd_Random() / 2147483561.0));
00310 
00311 } /* end of random_generator */

00326 static int
00327 ddExchange(
00328   DdManager * table,
00329   int  x,
00330   int  y,
00331   double  temp)
00332 {
00333     Move       *move,*moves;
00334     int        tmp;
00335     int        x_ref,y_ref;
00336     int        x_next,y_next;
00337     int        size, result;
00338     int        initial_size, limit_size;
00339 
00340     x_ref = x;
00341     y_ref = y;
00342 
00343     x_next = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
00344     y_next = cuddNextLow(table,y);
00345     moves = NULL;
00346     initial_size = limit_size = table->keys - table->isolated;
00347 
00348     for (;;) {
00349         if (x_next == y_next) {
00350             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,x_next);
00351             if (size == 0) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00352             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00353             if (move == NULL) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00354             move->x = x;
00355             move->y = x_next;
00356             move->size = size;
00357             move->next = moves;
00358             moves = move;
00359             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,y_next,y);
00360             if (size == 0) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00361             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00362             if (move == NULL) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00363             move->x = y_next;
00364             move->y = y;
00365             move->size = size;
00366             move->next = moves;
00367             moves = move;
00368             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,x_next);
00369             if (size == 0) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00370             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00371             if (move == NULL) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00372             move->x = x;
00373             move->y = x_next;
00374             move->size = size;
00375             move->next = moves;
00376             moves = move;
00377 
00378             tmp = x;
00379             x = y;
00380             y = tmp;
00381         } else if (x == y_next) {
00382             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,x_next);
00383             if (size == 0) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00384             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00385             if (move == NULL) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00386             move->x = x;
00387             move->y = x_next;
00388             move->size = size;
00389             move->next = moves;
00390             moves = move;
00391             tmp = x;
00392             x = y;
00393             y = tmp;
00394         } else {
00395             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,x_next);
00396             if (size == 0) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00397             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00398             if (move == NULL) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00399             move->x = x;
00400             move->y = x_next;
00401             move->size = size;
00402             move->next = moves;
00403             moves = move;
00404             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,y_next,y);
00405             if (size == 0) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00406             move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00407             if (move == NULL) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00408             move->x = y_next;
00409             move->y = y;
00410             move->size = size;
00411             move->next = moves;
00412             moves = move;
00413             x = x_next;
00414             y = y_next;
00415         }
00416 
00417         x_next = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
00418         y_next = cuddNextLow(table,y);
00419         if (x_next > y_ref) break;
00420 
00421         if ((double) size > DD_MAX_REORDER_GROWTH * (double) limit_size) {
00422             break;
00423         } else if (size < limit_size) {
00424             limit_size = size;
00425         }
00426     }
00427 
00428     if (y_next>=x_ref) {
00429         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,y_next,y);
00430         if (size == 0) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00431         move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00432         if (move == NULL) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00433         move->x = y_next;
00434         move->y = y;
00435         move->size = size;
00436         move->next = moves;
00437         moves = move;
00438     }
00439 
00440     /* move backward and stop at best position or accept uphill move */
00441     result = siftBackwardProb(table,moves,initial_size,temp);
00442     if (!result) goto ddExchangeOutOfMem;
00443 
00444     while (moves != NULL) {
00445         move = moves->next;
00446         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00447         moves = move;
00448     }
00449     return(1);
00450 
00451 ddExchangeOutOfMem:
00452     while (moves != NULL) {
00453         move = moves->next;
00454         cuddDeallocNode(table,(DdNode *) moves);
00455         moves = move;
00456     }
00457     return(0);
00458 
00459 } /* end of ddExchange */
00460 
00461 
00475 static int
00476 ddJumpingAux(
00477   DdManager * table,
00478   int  x,
00479   int  x_low,
00480   int  x_high,
00481   double  temp)
00482 {
00483     Move       *move;
00484     Move       *moves;        /* list of moves */
00485     int        initial_size;
00486     int        result;
00487 
00488     initial_size = table->keys - table->isolated;
00489 
00490 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00491     assert(table->subtables[x].keys > 0);
00492 #endif
00493 
00494     moves = NULL;
00495 
00496     if (cuddNextLow(table,x) < x_low) {
00497         if (cuddNextHigh(table,x) > x_high) return(1);
00498         moves = ddJumpingDown(table,x,x_high,initial_size);
00499         /* after that point x --> x_high unless early termination */
00500         if (moves == NULL) goto ddJumpingAuxOutOfMem;
00501         /* move backward and stop at best position or accept uphill move */
00502         result = siftBackwardProb(table,moves,initial_size,temp);
00503         if (!result) goto ddJumpingAuxOutOfMem;
00504     } else if (cuddNextHigh(table,x) > x_high) {
00505         moves = ddJumpingUp(table,x,x_low,initial_size);
00506         /* after that point x --> x_low unless early termination */
00507         if (moves == NULL) goto ddJumpingAuxOutOfMem;
00508         /* move backward and stop at best position or accept uphill move */
00509         result = siftBackwardProb(table,moves,initial_size,temp);
00510         if (!result) goto ddJumpingAuxOutOfMem;
00511     } else {
00512         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Unexpected condition in ddJumping\n");
00513         goto ddJumpingAuxOutOfMem;
00514     }
00515     while (moves != NULL) {
00516         move = moves->next;
00517         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00518         moves = move;
00519     }
00520     return(1);
00521 
00522 ddJumpingAuxOutOfMem:
00523     while (moves != NULL) {
00524         move = moves->next;
00525         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00526         moves = move;
00527     }
00528     return(0);
00529 
00530 } /* end of ddJumpingAux */
00531 
00532 
00546 static Move *
00547 ddJumpingUp(
00548   DdManager * table,
00549   int  x,
00550   int  x_low,
00551   int  initial_size)
00552 {
00553     Move       *moves;
00554     Move       *move;
00555     int        y;
00556     int        size;
00557     int        limit_size = initial_size;
00558 
00559     moves = NULL;
00560     y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
00561     while (y >= x_low) {
00562         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,y,x);
00563         if (size == 0) goto ddJumpingUpOutOfMem;
00564         move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00565         if (move == NULL) goto ddJumpingUpOutOfMem;
00566         move->x = y;
00567         move->y = x;
00568         move->size = size;
00569         move->next = moves;
00570         moves = move;
00571         if ((double) size > table->maxGrowth * (double) limit_size) {
00572             break;
00573         } else if (size < limit_size) {
00574             limit_size = size;
00575         }
00576         x = y;
00577         y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
00578     }
00579     return(moves);
00580 
00581 ddJumpingUpOutOfMem:
00582     while (moves != NULL) {
00583         move = moves->next;
00584         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00585         moves = move;
00586     }
00587     return(NULL);
00588 
00589 } /* end of ddJumpingUp */

00605 static Move *
00606 ddJumpingDown(
00607   DdManager * table,
00608   int  x,
00609   int  x_high,
00610   int  initial_size)
00611 {
00612     Move       *moves;
00613     Move       *move;
00614     int        y;
00615     int        size;
00616     int        limit_size = initial_size;
00617 
00618     moves = NULL;
00619     y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
00620     while (y <= x_high) {
00621         size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,x,y);
00622         if (size == 0) goto ddJumpingDownOutOfMem;
00623         move = (Move *)cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00624         if (move == NULL) goto ddJumpingDownOutOfMem;
00625         move->x = x;
00626         move->y = y;
00627         move->size = size;
00628         move->next = moves;
00629         moves = move;
00630         if ((double) size > table->maxGrowth * (double) limit_size) {
00631             break;
00632         } else if (size < limit_size) {
00633             limit_size = size;
00634         }
00635         x = y;
00636         y = cuddNextHigh(table,x);
00637     }
00638     return(moves);
00639 
00640 ddJumpingDownOutOfMem:
00641     while (moves != NULL) {
00642         move = moves->next;
00643         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) moves);
00644         moves = move;
00645     }
00646     return(NULL);
00647 
00648 } /* end of ddJumpingDown */

00650 
00665 static int
00666 siftBackwardProb(
00667   DdManager * table,
00668   Move * moves,
00669   int  size,
00670   double  temp)
00671 {
00672     Move   *move;
00673     int    res;
00674     int    best_size = size;
00675     double coin, threshold;
00676 
00677     /* Look for best size during the last sifting */
00678     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00679         if (move->size < best_size) {
00680             best_size = move->size;
00681         }
00682     }
00683     
00684     /* If best_size equals size, the last sifting did not produce any
00685     ** improvement. We now toss a coin to decide whether to retain
00686     ** this change or not.
00687     */
00688     if (best_size == size) {
00689         coin = random_generator();
00690 #ifdef DD_STATS
00691         tosses++;
00692 #endif
00693         threshold = exp(-((double)(table->keys - table->isolated - size))/temp);
00694         if (coin < threshold) {
00695 #ifdef DD_STATS
00696             acceptances++;
00697 #endif
00698             return(1);
00699         }
00700     }
00701 
00702     /* Either there was improvement, or we have decided not to
00703     ** accept the uphill move. Go to best position.
00704     */
00705     res = table->keys - table->isolated;
00706     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00707         if (res == best_size) return(1);
00708         res = cuddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00709         if (!res) return(0);
00710     }
00711 
00712     return(1);
00713 
00714 } /* end of sift_backward_prob */
00715

00729 static void
00730 copyOrder(
00731   DdManager * table,
00732   int * array,
00733   int  lower,
00734   int  upper)
00735 {
00736     int i;
00737     int nvars;
00738 
00739     nvars = upper - lower + 1;
00740     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00741         array[i] = table->invperm[i+lower];
00742     }
00743 
00744 } /* end of copyOrder */
00745 
00746 
00759 static int
00760 restoreOrder(
00761   DdManager * table,
00762   int * array,
00763   int  lower,
00764   int  upper)
00765 {
00766     int i, x, y, size;
00767     int nvars = upper - lower + 1;
00768 
00769     for (i = 0; i < nvars; i++) {
00770         x = table->perm[array[i]];
00771 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00772     assert(x >= lower && x <= upper);
00773 #endif
00774         y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
00775         while (y >= i + lower) {
00776             size = cuddSwapInPlace(table,y,x);
00777             if (size == 0) return(0);
00778             x = y;
00779             y = cuddNextLow(table,x);
00780         }
00781     }
00782 
00783     return(1);
00784 
00785 } /* end of restoreOrder */
